Package demoworld.controller

Class Controller

Object
GameController
Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainController, ReliesOnCharacterData
public class Controller extends GameController implements ReliesOnCharacterData, MainController
The main controller, in addition to normal controller responsibilities, is also responsible for instantiating all the other controllers, as well as holding some methods for intercontroller communication.
